title: Bug 15899 - 'Close All Saved' not working consistently
description: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' option does not always close all editors.
OB: When selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu after creating a new file f1.txt, the editors are not closed in some cases.
EB: The 'Close All Saved' option should close all editors consistently when selected from the file menu.
SR:
1. Open build 20020508 with latest UI code.
2. Create a new file f1.txt.
3. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
